title: Grimmiaceae
text:
Grimmiaceae is a <a href="family%20%28biology%29">family</a> of <a href="moss">moss</a>es in the order <a href="Grimmiales">Grimmiales</a>.
Genera.
"<a href="The%20Plant%20List">The Plant List</a>" and "<a href="Tropicos">Tropicos</a>" list the following genera:
Fossil record.
A fossil species, "<a href="Tricarinella">Tricarinella crassiphylla</a>" is known from the <a href="Early%20Cretaceous">Early Cretaceous</a> (<a href="Valanginian">Valanginian</a> ~136 million years ago) Apple Bay flora on <a href="Vancouver%20Island">Vancouver Island</a>, Canada, which is the oldest known member of the <a href="Dicranidae">Dicranidae</a>.
